text: Work Like Any Other is a 2016 debut novel by Virginia Reeves. Set in 1920s, it narrates the story of a poor electrician who siphons energy from his town's electricity source to save his family from poverty.http://themanbookerprize.com/books/work-any-other-by-virginia-reeves In July 2016 the book was longlisted for the 2016 Man Booker Prize. ==References== Category:2016 American novels
title: Work Like Any Other
